exploration.title: Global Exploration
exploration.description: Embark on extraordinary adventures to breathtaking corners of the globe. From secluded islands to vibrant cities, we unveil a world of possibilities, limited only by your imagination.

guidance.title: Expert Guidance
guidance.description: Our seasoned travel experts are your trusted companions, curating seamless journeys and providing insider knowledge to ensure every step of your adventure is smooth, insightful, and worry-free.

experiences.title: Crafted Experiences
experiences.description: Your journey is a masterpiece in the making. We tailor each itinerary to your unique desires, whether you seek thrilling adventures, peaceful retreats, or a blend of cultural immersion and relaxation.

destinations.title: Discover Your Dream Destination
destinations.subtitle: A collection of breathtaking destinations curated by PalmStar.

cards.name: Bali, Indonesia
cards.description: Lush rice terraces, ancient temples, vibrant nightlife, and world-class surfing.

cards.name: Santorini, Greece
cards.description: Romantic sunsets, white-washed villages, volcanic beaches, and ancient ruins.

cards.name: Machu Picchu, Peru
cards.description: Hike through the Andes to reach the ancient Incan city—stunning architecture and breathtaking scenery.

cards.name: Queenstown, New Zealand
cards.description: The adventure capital of the world—bungee jumping, skydiving, hiking, and breathtaking mountain views.

cards.name: Iceland
cards.description: Witness the Northern Lights, explore glaciers, soak in hot springs, and experience the unique beauty of this Nordic wonderland.

cards.name: Tahiti, French Polynesia
cards.description: Escape to a paradise of turquoise lagoons, overwater bungalows, vibrant coral reefs, and the captivating spirit of Polynesian culture.

cards.name: Maldives
cards.description: Discover a paradise of overwater bungalows, pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant coral reefs. Indulge in luxury and tranquility in this secluded haven.

cards.name: Maasai Mara, Kenya
cards.description: Witness the Great Migration, encounter majestic wildlife on thrilling game drives, and experience the rich culture of the Maasai people.
